# Paths to keep from origin/main during upstream sync.
# One pathspec per line.
# Supports git pathspec magic, e.g. :(glob)...

# Keep fork-specific wrapper removals
:(glob)packages/*/default.nix
packages/flake-inputs/default.nix
packages/formatter/default.nix
packages/formatter/treefmt.nix
:(glob).github/**/*
